name: Woodland Defenders
description:
Woodland Defenders  is a tower defense game made for global game jam 2023 and its theme: Roots.

GitLab: https://gitlab.com/RibRob_/treetowerdefense

Controls

Up / Down Arrow to cycle through turrets

Left / Right Arrow to rotate

Scroll wheel to zoom

W to move forward

E to root turret in place

Q to unroot

Credits

- Adam Salam (Turret and Enemy programmer)

- Austin Lothman (3D Modeler and Animator, and Video Editor)

- Joey Thompson (Turret Programmer)

- Samuel Ayeni (Enemy Programmer)

- Rob Harwood (Camera, Turret, and UI programmer)
